hero.title: Promark Safe+ Series
hero.subtitle: Class 1 fiber and MOPA marking systems for fast, precise engraving on metals and engineered materials.

image.alt: Promark Safe+ fiber laser marker in its enclosure.

highlight.title: Supports 150+ materials
highlight.copy: Engrave and mark a wide range of metals and plastics with consistent results.

highlight.title: 20 W – 100 W options
highlight.copy: Pick the wattage that fits your workflow, from fast black marking to deep engraving.

highlight.title: 0.03 mm laser spot
highlight.copy: Ultra-fine galvo spot size for crisp serials, QR codes, and detailed artwork.

slalom.heading: Your Metal Marking Solution.
bodyHtml: Promark combines high accuracy with a compact, intuitive design. It supports materials like stainless steel, aluminum, brass, and titanium, as well as select plastics and acrylics. Whether you’re crafting fine jewelry, customizing tools, or making industrial parts, Promark delivers the precision and power you need to elevate your projects with ease.

post-material.heading: PromarkDesktop Safe+ specifications
bodyHtml:
Laser safety
Class 1 (IEC 60825-1)
Laser type
Fiber laser
Power
20 W / 30 W / 50 W
Work area
8.7" × 8.7" (220 × 220 mm)
Laser spot
0.03 mm
Max engraving speed
10,000 mm/s
Dimensions
14.7" × 20.9" × 24.6" (374 × 532 × 625 mm)
Weight
20 W: 76.3 lbs (34.6 kg); 30 W / 50 W: 72.9 lbs (33.1 kg)
Positioning
Camera preview / red light preview / dynamic focus
Software
Beam Studio / LightBurn
Connection
USB-A

media.alt: PromarkDesktop Safe+ laser marker on a bench.
